articles.description: John Legend continues to distance himself from Kanye West. The Grammy Award-winning musician's new album, 'Bigger Love', is his first not on West's record label.
articles.content: John Legend is done with Kanye West. The All of Me singer has new music out now and it has no connection to West. Keep reading to learn what the Grammy Award-winning musician has to say about parting… [+3167 chars]

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Keedron Bryant, 'I Just Wanna Live' singer, lands record deal - CNN
articles.description: A teen gospel singer whose song protesting the killing of African Americans by police went viral has been signed by Warner Records.

articles.title: Taylor Swift got educated on Juneteenth and wants you to be, too - CNN
articles.description: From now on, anyone working for Taylor Swift will have the day off for Juneteenth.
